name: The Hidden Ghost
description:
The Hidden Ghost is a casual-survival game where you as a ghost must not be caught by the guards. Be sneaky and fast and catch them from behind without being caught!

Be very careful at the cameras and other traps which will surely appear as you reach higher levels.

Game Features:
- For sure a family friendly game
- 54 unique levels
- Laser video cameras, guards and even police are those who will try to discover you
